```{r packages}
library(tidyverse)
library(rvest)
library(httr2)
```


```{r}
base_url <- "https://the-one-api.dev/v2"
key <- "c-DPIqdcASjHVb6UHgy1"
  
request(base_url)|>
req_url_path_append('/character')|>
req_auth_bearer_token("c-DPIqdcASjHVb6UHgy1")|>
req_perform()|>
resp_body_json() -> lotr_data
```

```{r}
lotr_data_test <- tibble(json = lotr_data)
```

```{r}
lotr_data_test|>
  slice(1)|>
  unnest_longer(json)|>
  unnest_wider(json) -> lotr_data_test
```
